chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 Pro has the above problem:
The device won't turn on and was already reset to factory settings. Still doesn't work.
Thank you for your help,

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Produkt mit iCloud/Google verknüpft.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

The phone is iCloud locked, please assist the customer in unlinking their iCloud account from the phone.

Regards,
KJ

Dear Backcare,

The device is still iCloud locked. Please assist the customer in unlinking their account.

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile

iCloud is removed.




Regards,
Jorge from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, we are unable to repair the device and we do not have enough stock to process an exchange. I have proceeded with a refund instead.

Regards,
RK
